dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Prime meridian: Mexico City. Printed on two sheets joined together to form one map, sectioned in 4 and mounted on cloth for folding. Accompanied by Notice sûr la carte du Mexique au 3,000,000 : extrait du bulletin de la Socièté de géographie. Paris : Libraire militaire de J. Dumaine, 1874. 22 p. ; 25 cm. Includes inset "Carte des divisions politiques." Historic Maps copy imperfect: cover and Notice wanting.
